statements: SELECT * FROM PrisonOvercrowding ORDER BY prison_name ASC;
SELECT prison_name, capacity FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE current_population > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE date_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT prison_name, current_population FROM PrisonOvercrowding ORDER BY current_population DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT prison_id, prison_name, capacity FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE current_population > capacity;
SELECT prison_name, current_population FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE current_population < capacity;
SELECT prison_id, prison_name, capacity, current_population FROM PrisonOvercrowding ORDER BY prison_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE date_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT prison_id, prison_name, capacity, current_population, date_updated FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE prison_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners;
SELECT id, name, age FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, crime, entry_date FROM Prisoners ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE crime LIKE '%murder%';
SELECT name, cell_type FROM Prisoners INNER JOIN PrisonCells ON Prisoners.id = PrisonCells.prisoner_id;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, crime FROM Prisoners WHERE crime LIKE 'murder%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, age, entry_date FROM Prisoners WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY entry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE crime IN ('theft', 'fraud', 'burglary') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, crime, release_date FROM Prisoners WHERE release_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, sentence_length, cell_number, age FROM Prisoners WHERE sentence_length > 5;
SELECT name, age FROM Prisoners ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cells WHERE capacity > 10 AND prisoners_inside < capacity;
SELECT name, position FROM PrisonStaff WHERE prison_block = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, sentence_length, cell_number FROM Prisoners WHERE sentence_length > 10 ORDER BY sentence_length DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Prisoners WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND cell_number != 5;
SELECT name, position FROM PrisonStaff WHERE prison_block = 'A' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cells WHERE capacity - prisoners_inside > 0;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners;
SELECT name, age, crime FROM Prisoners ORDER BY age;
SELECT prisoner_id, name, sentence_length FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Cells WHERE occupancy < capacity ORDER BY location;
SELECT COUNT(prisoner_id) AS num_prisoners, AVG(sentence_length) AS avg_sentence_length FROM Prisoners;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners;
SELECT name, age, crime FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30 AND crime = 'Murder';
SELECT location, capacity, occupancy FROM Cells ORDER BY occupancy DESC;
SELECT prisoner_id, name, sentence_length FROM Prisoners_Guards JOIN Prisoners ON Prisoners_Guards.prisoner_id = Prisoners.prisoner_id WHERE guard_id = 1;
SELECT date, total_prisoners, total_cells, overcrowding_rate FROM Prison_Stats WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Prisoners;
SELECT name, age, sentence_start_date FROM Prisoners ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT cell_number, capacity, availability FROM PrisonCells WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT officer_id, name, rank, shift_start FROM PrisonOfficers WHERE rank = 'Sergeant';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date, description FROM PrisonIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prisoners
SELECT name, age FROM Prisoners WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT prisoner_id, name, sentence_start_date FROM Prisoners WHERE sentence_length > 10 ORDER BY sentence_start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Prisoners WHERE age < 25 AND cell_number > 100
SELECT officer_id, name, rank FROM PrisonOfficers
